Description: Allston right by HBS and close to Cambridge- Short walk to Harvard Business School and Harvard Square. Immaculate 5 Room Apt, 2 BR, Front & Rear Porches, 3rd Floor in turn of century Three Family home. Spacious 1000 sq/ft, Shiny Hardwood floors, Eat-in Kitchen with walk-in Pantry, Laundry and Storage in basement. Fenced in backyard. Easy access to Rte 90 and Storrow Drive.
